name: stacksolo
description: A local webapp that helps solo developers scaffold and deploy cloud infrastructure using Pulumi
author: MonkeyBarrels LLC

scripts.dev:api: lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pnpm --filter @stacksolo/api dev
scripts.dev:web: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pnpm --filter @stacksolo/web dev
scripts.cli:link: pnpm --filter @stacksolo/cli build && cd packages/cli && npm link
